column3: Three portals: Participant (coach selection), Coach (session logging), Admin (dashboard + management)

column3: Two program tracks: TWO_SESSION (2 sessions) and FIVE_SESSION (5 sessions)

column3: Show 3 coaches (not full grid). Participant can remix for new set. Capacity-aware.

Platform must serve as MVP foundation for handling ALL FranklinCovey coaching engagements â€” not just the government contract. Architecture should avoid single-program assumptions without over-engineering the MVP.
column7: Government contract is immediate deliverable. Architecture choices should keep door open for: multi-program support / additional engagement types / broader coach pool. Do NOT build multi-tenancy or abstract engagement types now.
